name: No Bake Eggplant Lasagna
description: Dive into a healthy culinary experience with our No Bake Eggplant Lasagna! This dish is perfect for those seeking a low-carb and low-sugar option without sacrificing flavor. Packed with fresh vegetables, aromatic herbs, and a mix of sharp cheddar and Parmesan cheese, it's a delicious way to indulge in healthy eating. Whether you're following a health-conscious diet or simply looking for a flavorful meal, this eggplant lasagna is a must-try.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the eggplant and tomatoes, then slice the eggplant into thin rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the tomatoes and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the red onion and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together marjoram, oregano, smoked paprika, thyme, and rosemary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Layer a slice of eggplant on a plate, followed by a slice of tomato. Sprinkle some of the herb mixture over the tomato.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add a small amount of chopped onion and garlic on top, then a couple of slices of cheddar cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used, finishing with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, melt butter over low heat and add the remaining herb mixture. Stir in water, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 5 minutes to create a herb-infused sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the herb sauce gently over the assembled lasagna. Allow it to sit for a few minutes so the flavors meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
